name: Mist Ball
effect:
Reduce the target's Special. 
 At Silver Rank, increase this move's power to 4.
 At Gold Rank, this also move reduces the target's Special Defense.
 At Platinum Rank, increase this move's power to 6.
 At Diamond Rank, this move's stat reductions stack on repeated usage against the same target.
description: The user engulfs its foe with a cloud of mist. This soothing mist keeps evil intents from surfacing into the foe's mind.
